items.title: North Korea's Kim arrives in Beijing with daughter and possible heir
items.description: The North Korean leader is due to attend a military parade and attend his first multilateral meeting.

items.title: Gold price hits record high as investors seek safety
items.description: Experts say uncertainty resulting from US policy is making investors seek safer investments such as gold.

items.title: Judge blocks Trump's deployment of National Guard to LA
items.description: A federal judge rules the government broke a law limiting domestic use of the military.

items.title: GÃ©rard Depardieu to face trial over rape and sexual assault allegations
items.description: His accuser, Charlotte Arnould, says she is relieved the case is going to court, seven years after she filed a complaint.

items.title: Chloe Malle to become top editor at American Vogue
items.description: The 39-year-old's appointment marks a new era for one of the most influential and glamorous fashion publications.
